0.post_text: If you have a burning BMW i question, our Product Geniuses are here to help! Bring your questions to 303 Alexandra Road and #askagenius

1.post_text: Look at what we spotted at the WTA Finals at Singapore Indoor Stadium! Did you know that BMW is the official car of the BNP Paribas WTA Finals Singapore presented by SC Global?

2.story: BMW Singapore updated their cover photo.

comments.message: Jessica Tan We are having an enjoyable family dinner.

3.post_text: There's no better way to hit the town in style than in a BMW. Tag the person you're celebrating the weekend with below.

4.post_text:
Experience a showcase of dynamism and power as the top female tennis athletes in the world come to town. 

BMW is the official car of the BNP Paribas WTA Finals Singapore presented by SC Global, and we are pleased to serve up a range of exhilarating deals.

With any purchase of a BMW 3 Series, BMW 5 Series or BMW 7 Series programme car, you will be entitled to a pair of tickets to this elite tournament, and enjoy savings of up to $40,000.

Visit Performance Motors or call 6653 8051 to reserve your test drive today.

comments.message: Sure, Let's take a selfie of BMW 730Li!
Can I volunteer to be the driver

5.post_text: Did you know that top tennis players like Maria Sharapova will be chauffeured around the island in style in the BMW 730Li and BMW 520i limousines during the WTA Finals?

6.post_text:
With an in-depth knowledge of the BMW i3 and BMW i8, our Product Genius is the man who has the answer to all your questions.

Come down to 303 Alexandra Road today and #askagenius!

7.post_text: The BMW S1000R is such a compelling proposition. Deyna Chia's review of BMW's new supernaked shows it's something that can tempt superbike riders that want track-worthy power with no compromises on fun and functionality. Read more at: http://www.bmwmotorrad.com.sg/motorcycles/roadster/s1000r/#reviews

8.post_text:
"With the introduction of BMW i, we have shown how far we have gone in terms of design … These are things that won’t go away after today, they will stay." -Adrian van Hooydonk, Director of BMW Group Design.

Come down to 303 Alexandra Road and see the BMW i3 for yourself.

10.post_text: If you had the chance to go for a road trip with a friend, who would it be? Tag him or her in the comments below.

11.post_text:
Experience a showcase of dynamism and power as the top female tennis athletes in the world come to town.

BMW is the official car of the BNP Paribas WTA Finals Singapore presented by SC Global, and we are pleased to serve up a range of exhilarating deals.

With any purchase of a BMW 3 Series, BMW 5 Series or BMW 7 Series programme car, you will be entitled to a pair of tickets+ to this elite tournament, and enjoy savings of up to $40,000.

And if you are an existing BMW customer with Performance Motors, log on to www.pml.com.sg/wtatickets to redeem complimentary tickets to this prestigious event. Tickets are limited. 

Visit Performance Motors or call 6653 8051 to reserve your test drive today.

12.post_text: Think you know all about the BMW i3? Think Again. Meet our Product Geniuses. They can help answer any questions you might have about the all new BMW i3. #askagenius

13.post_text:
The BMW four-cylinder engine heritage was so important that in the 1960s they even designed their headquarters to look like one. 

Come pop by 303 Alexandra Road and see how far our cars progressed since then.

14.post_text: The BMW 7 Series is for those ready to go from just powerful engines to engineering masterpieces, from an extraordinary car to a remarkable flagship. If you are ready to take that next step, drop by 303 Alexandra Road today.

15.post_text:
When the old meets the new! #BMWi3Spotted #BornElectric #Shophouses #Singapore

Visual by TopGear Singapore.

16.story: BMW Singapore added 129 new photos — at BMW Singapore.

17.post_text:
Pure performance. Sensuous aesthetics. Innovation unsurpassed. This perfect expression of elegance and power rarely comes with an irresistible offer that thrills the heart. 

But for a limited time, receive $40,000* off the BMW 730Li programme cars as well as a worry-free service maintenance package with BMW Service Inclusive* for 3 years/60,000km. 

Or enjoy preferential rates on the BMW 640i Gran Coupé programme cars with BMW Individual — a range of customisations with the finest details to reflect your distinguished style. Alternatively with Performance Direct, you will also have the flexibility of driving home the BMW 520i programme car from just $2,800* per month with zero down payment.

Such luxuries, however, seldom have the luxury of time. Visit Performance Motors or call 6653 8051 to reserve your test drive today.

18.post_text:
Feast your eyes on the new BMW i3 at the Singapore International Photography Festival. It's picture perfect.

Do catch the BMW i3 display from today till 30 November 2014. #BMWi3Spotted #SIPF

19.post_text: "At the BMW Group, we have a passion for mobility. We drive people, markets and ourselves forward, never content to rest on our laurels. Our creativity and our love of new ideas are our driving force. That is how the BMW Group has maintained its position on the market for the past 97 years." - Norbert Reithofer, CEO

20.post_text:
BMW Motorrad showroom at 315 Alexandra Road will be closed from Friday, 3rd October to Monday, 6th October.
 
Business will resume on Tuesday, 7th October.
 
We look forward to giving you more riding pleasure on the road ahead!

21.post_text: The athletic build of the BMW 3 Series cuts an impressive figure on the street. Couple that with its optional 8-speed sport automatic transmission, and you get smooth gear changes with a lowered fuel consumption as well. Talk about a win-win. #BMW

comments.message: Gran coupe 4 series even more beautiful

22.post_text: The love of the open road is reflected in our authentic BMW merchandise and precision-crafted accessories. Head down to our showroom at 303 Alexandra Road and check out our exclusive BMW merchandise.

comments.message: Launching BMW i3 with a greatest title

23.post_text:
BMW Product Genius Cheng Han Lee patiently explaining the key features of the new BMW i3 to one of our customers.

Have any queries regarding the BMW i3? Speak to a Product Genius today at our showroom at 303 Alexandra Road. #askagenius

24.post_text: Last few days left to the BMW World Xpo 2014! Come down now to our showroom at 303 Alexandra Road for fun-filled activities and sip on customised coffee while you get up and personal with our beautiful cars. Your children will also enjoy our Lego, Kinetic Sandplay, and much more.
